blogPost.excerpt: Take a Walk is a tool made to keep you company while you work or study. You name the place, weather, and time of day, or just leave the magic up to us. It's up to you ❤️
blogPost.body: Take a Walk is a tool made to keep you company while you work or study. You name the place, weather, and time of day, or just leave the magic up to us. It's up to you ❤️
blogPost.title: Take A Walk - Go anywhere in the world while you WFH, study or just relax.
blogPost.author: Mars H

localize.description: Take a Walk是一款在你工作或学习时陪伴你的工具。你可以指定地点、天气和时间，也可以把魔法交给我们。由你决定❤️
localize.tagline: 当你在WFH，学习或只是放松时，去世界任何地方。

localize.description: Take a Walk是一款在你工作或學習時陪伴你的工具。你可以指定地點、天氣和時間，也可以把魔法交給我們。由你決定❤️
localize.tagline: 當你在WFH，學習或只是放鬆時，去世界任何地方。

previous.excerpt: Labeling images is essential for good computer vision models. Roboflow Annotate empowers you to annotate images easily & model-assisted labeling can take a first pass at labeling your images for you! You can export to any format (COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XML…)
previous.title: Roboflow Annotate - Annotate images with ease. Export to any format.

localize.description: 给图像贴标签是做好计算机视觉模型的关键。Roboflow Annotate使您能够轻松地对图像进行标注，并且模型辅助标注可以为您的图像进行第一次标注！Roboflow Annotate可以为您提供任何格式的输出（COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XML...）。你可以导出为任何格式（COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XML...）。
localize.tagline: 轻松注释图像。导出为任何格式。

localize.description: 給圖像貼標籤是做好計算機視覺模型的關鍵。Roboflow Annotate使您能夠輕鬆地對圖像進行標註，並且模型輔助標註可以爲您的圖像進行第一次標註！Roboflow Annotate可以爲您提供任何格式的輸出（COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XML...）。你可以導出爲任何格式（COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XML...）。
localize.tagline: 輕鬆註釋圖像。導出爲任何格式。

next.excerpt: With WhatsApp Actions, it is now possible to send messages to your contacts on WhatsApp right from your Hubspot workflows.
next.title: WhatsApp Actions for HubSpot - Send WhatsApp messages from HubSpot workflows

localize.description: 有了 WhatsApp Actions，现在可以直接从 Hubspot 工作流向 WhatsApp 上的联系人发送消息。
有了 WhatsApp Actions，現在可以直接從 Hubspot 工作流向 WhatsApp 上的聯繫人發送消息。
